programme.title: Live: Football Night in America

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Patriots (11-3) continue pursuit of the AFC's best record as they visit the Ravens (7-7) on Sunday Night Football. New England is 6-0 on the road this season, but failed to put a chokehold on the AFC East by losing at home to Buffalo on Dec. 14.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Aggies (6-6) and Cougars (6-6) take to the blue turf of Albertsons Stadium for the Famous Idaho Potato Bowl. Utah State fell to Georgia State 45-22 in 2023, dropping its Potato Bowl record to 1-4. Washington State topped Utah State 49-28 in 2024.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Live: NFL Monday Night Countdown
programme.desc: An in-depth look at Monday's game and reviews of Sunday's games.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: Philip Rivers is thrust into the national spotlight as his Colts (8-6) host the 49ers (10-4). Rivers, 44, returned from a five-year absence from pro football in Week 15, throwing for 120 yards and touchdown as Indianapolis lost 18-16 at Seattle.

programme.desc: The latest scores and highlights, with host Jay Onrait.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Cardinals (8-4) line up against the Rockets (8-4) in the Boca Raton Bowl. Toledo won bowl games in two of the last three years, moving to 2-0 at the Boca Raton Bowl by beating Liberty in 2022. The Rockets are riding a four-game win streak.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Hilltoppers and Golden Eagles descend on the Crescent City to compete in the New Orleans Bowl. Western Kentucky has won all four meetings, including 45-28 in the 2015 Conference USA championship game. Southern Miss moved to the Sun Belt in 2022.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU provides help and protection for a longtime domestic violence victim, but when she winds up at the defendant's table in court, Rollins surprises Carisi with a formidable opponent at trial.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Holiday celebrations are interrupted when Detective Tutuola's ex-brother-in-law is arrested for attacking a priest; during the investigation, a church scandal is uncovered.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU is called in to help investigate a wave of hate crimes on Christmas Eve; Rollins catches up with an old flame.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi and Rollins work together on an important arraignment; Benson tries to make Noah's Christmas wish come true when a case falls in her lap.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The case of a teenage girl assaulted in the projects leads to a startling discovery; Benson puts her trust in someone from her past.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Amaro asks the SVU for help in clearing a convicted man's name and brings a figure from Benson's past back into her life.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi tries Richard Wheatley for the murder of Kathy Stabler; Benson finds herself at odds with a friend when Barba agrees to take the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler take over the search for a runaway girl and are led to an underground rave culture that caters to wayward teens.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: DDA Jonah Dekker (Terrence Howard) comes to New York to defend his cousin, who has been accused of rape; ADA Casey Novak (Diane Neal) helps Detectives Stabler and Benson with the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenage girl disappears, the squad discovers a suspect who seems to be targeting young, vulnerable women with a similar personal connection; Dr. Huang delves into his past in order to help solve the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Barba relies on old evidence, and faces off against a former colleague, during the trial of child abductor Lewis Hodda.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives interview an overprotective woman (Diane Verona) to find out why her son is scavenging for food in the garbage; the boy later is later found dead and his older brother confesses to killing him.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After finding out a dead teenage girl was a bully, detectives look for murder suspects at her school.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a Chinese woman's daughter is held for ransom by smugglers, the detectives turn to her sister for help.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The son of an outspoken critic becomes the prime suspect when the star of a controversial teen show is raped in her trailer on the set.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a missing 5-year-old boy is found dead, suspicion falls on his unstable 13-year-old neighbor, whose mental problems began after he was abused at a camp recommended by the dead child's father.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate a man whose 12-year-old wife is hospitalized with pregnancy complications, and they learn that he is the leader of a cult.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A professor (Billy Campbell) accused of sexual assault volunteers to submit a DNA sample for testing, but the case turns into a he-said, she-said standoff.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After recovering from being shot during a robbery, Fin returns to the narcotics division to keep a promise he made to locate a missing person.

programme.title: Premier League Live
programme.desc: Discussion and analysis of Premier League soccer.

programme.title: Live: Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Fulham FC and Nottingham Forest FC gather at Craven Cottage for this Premier League outing. Forest have won three of their past four across all competitions after blanking Spurs 3-0 in league play Dec. 14. Fulham beat Forest twice in 2024-25.

programme.title: Live: Premier League Goal Zone
programme.desc: The best moments from the weekend in Premier League action.

programme.title: Everything on the Menu With Braun Strowman
programme.desc: Braun storms Fort Worth for ribs, shareables, and a deep dive into Texas food and heritage.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A gang member is pushed from a rooftop in what appears to be retribution for a sexual assault, but when the assault victim also turns up dead, the detectives realize the case is far more complicated.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A tip leads Benson and Cragen to the body of a 7-year-old boy, missing since 1980, and the detectives think the new information was a ploy to help the suspected killer, on death row for another murder, delay his execution.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Fin investigate the brutal rape and murder of a prostitute, and the prime suspects turn out to be a group of teens suspected of re-enacting a favorite video game.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives discover that a murdered teenage girl was a prostitute and had contracted HIV while working on a pornographic film, which leads them to her killer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler struggles to keep his emotions in check as he interrogates a man (Matthew Modine) suspected in the murder of a teenage girl -- a man he once let get away on similar charges.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A mother who reported the statutory rape of her daughter is found murdered.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler have a suspect (Alfred Molina) but not enough evidence when a serial rapist preys on illegal immigrant women, and Tracy Kibre (Bebe Neuwirth) is brought in to work on the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler probe an assault and carjacking, only to find that it is connected to illegal trafficking in painkillers apparently headed by an elderly woman (Melinda Dillon).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After finding out a dead teenage girl was a bully, detectives look for murder suspects at her school.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: After a young father is found dead in his home in Jonesboro, Ark., the authorities search for the killer.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Two murders in Toronto ignite an investigation that spans four decades; breakthroughs in investigative genetic genealogy help crack the case.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Two murders in Toronto ignite an investigation that spans four decades; breakthroughs in investigative genetic genealogy help crack the case.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Terrorist leaders are suspected of murdering a retired Army sergeant; Deek connects with a person of interest in the case.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team searches for a missing book containing top-secret information, which belonged to an antiques dealer who was murdered.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Hetty and the team continue searching for an elusive book that has the attention of foreign security agencies.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A child dies in the emergency room after passing out during a prayer vigil at a late-night church service.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The search for the sexual abuser of a child leads the detectives to a wealthy toy mogul known for his generous hospitality toward children.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives try to decipher a motive for the strangulation of a Bronx assistant DA in an area where hookers stroll.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman claiming to have been the victim of rape commits suicide while she is still in the emergency room.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The death of a wealthy senior citizen leads to an investigations that uncovers a serial killer who targets the elderly.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A mother becomes Stabler and Benson's prime suspect in the poisoning of her child; Novak enlists Clark's assistance in obtaining evidence to remove a judge from the bench after his bias in two child abuse cases leads to a wrongful arrest.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A video voyeur catches a sexual assault against a minor on tape, which changes the focus of the investigation as the detectives search for a pedophile.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman attempts to kidnap a child she believes is her daughter; while DNA tests are in progress, Benson traces the confusion about the child's origins back to a fertility doctor.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a missing 16-year-old girl is found in a deserted building, she tells the skeptical detectives that three men in uniform kept her there for several days.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler must rely on a psychiatrist (Mary Stuart Masterson) and her schizophrenic patient to find the man behind a number of assaults on the Upper West Side.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: While examining a 9-year-old girl after a car crash, doctors find that she has been molested and call in Benson and Stabler, who learn that the girl's attacker has killed another child.
